sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ_NO ,TITLE ,WRITER ,CONTENT ,WRITE_NO ,REG_DATE ,VIEW_CNT FROM BR0010 ORDER BY SEQ_NO DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BR0010 ( SEQ_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,WRITER ,WRITE_NO ,REG_DATE ,VIEW_CNT ) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO + 1), 1) FROM BR0010) ,#title# ,#content# ,#writer# ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(WRITE_NO + 1), 1) FROM BR0010 WHERE WRITER = #writer#) ,SYSDATE ,0)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BR0010 WHERE WRITER = #WRITER# AND WRITE_NO = #WRITE_NO#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BR0010 SET VIEW_CNT = #VIEW_CNT# WHERE WRITER = #WRITER# AND WRITE_NO = #WRITE_NO#;
